title: FortiGate Security Appliance 10Gbps
introduction: The FortiGate Security Appliance (FSA) 10 Gbps is a single tenant (dedicated), self-managed, high-throughput (10 Gbps) hardware firewall.

links.title: Getting started with FortiGate Security Appliance 10 Gbps

section_highlights.title: What is computer networking?
section_highlights.description: An IBM overview of computer networking to enable the transmission and exchange of information and resources.

section_highlights.title: Db2 Optimization Techniques for SAP Database Migration to the Cloud
section_highlights.description: This IBM Redbook provides in-depth recommendations for the source system database export.

tiles.title: You can now update a FortiGate Security Appliance (FSA) FG-1500DT 10 Gbps to the latest available firmware version by opening a support case in the IBM Cloud portal.
New data centers are now supported for FSA 10 Gbps, in Dallas, Seoul, and London. For more information, refer to Available data centers.
